Saitou in RK... just too cool for words, in deed and looks, and I love the way he messes with Sanosuke's head and teases him mercilessly.  Itou in NHK's Shinsengumi!  --- two words:  Shosuke Tanihara.  ^_^  I would've followed *him* anywhere (and I wouldn't be alone, right Barb?).  I love his calm and intelligence and the way his face changes mood so quickly and effortlessly.
 
phil

community.
I love Okita. Most from Peace Maker and also like the character of him in 
RK. ^__^
